text: Pamene iwe uli pakati pawo ndipo uli kuwatsogolera pa mapemphero, lola gulu lina la iwo kuti liime pamodzi ndi iwe, atanyamula zida zawo za nkhondo. Akatha kugwetsa nkhope zawo pansi apite kumbuyo kwanu ndipo libwere gulu lina limene silinapemphere kuti lipemphere nawe, ayenera kukhala tcheru ndi kutenga zida zawo za nkhondo. Anthu osakhulupirira amafuna inu mutaiwala zida zanu ndi katundu wanu kuti akukantheni nthawi imodzi, koma palibe cholakwa ngati musiya zida zanu chifukwa cha mavuto ena monga mvula kapena matenda koma khala tcheru. Ndithudi Mulungu wawakonzera anthu wosakhulupirira chilango chochititsa manyazi
